io.smudgr.engine.utility

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.Parametric
      • io.smudgr.engine.Smudge
        • io.smudgr.engine.utility.Utility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectItem, ReflectableType

    public class Utility
extends Smudge
    The Utility smudge is a container for UtilityComponent instances. Each UtilityComponent serves a role in determining the entire Utility behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeName

        public java.lang.String getTypeName()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        The user identifiable name of this implementation.

        This name can safely be changed between versions of the application, and may be used for translations.

        Implementations of this implementation should not override this method.

        Returns:
        String that will identify this implementation to the user.
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryName(), ReflectableType.getTypeIdentifier()

      • getTypeIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        This should return a unique identifier of this type implementation.

        The name that this type implementation is identified to the user with may differ from this identifier. This concept is similar to a 'slug'.

        Implementations of a type should use this method to distinguish themselves.

        The String returned by this method should be changed between versions.

        Returns:
        String that will enumerate this implementation across versions of the application
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryIdentifier(), ReflectableType.getTypeName()

      • onInit

        public void onInit()
        Description copied from class: Smudge
        Initialize the smudge. This will be run when the Smudge is added to the Rack, and every time the project is started.
        Specified by:
        onInit in class Smudge

      • smudge

        public Frame smudge(Frame image)
        Description copied from class: Smudge
        Smudge types implement this method to apply their image manipulations using any given Frame
        Specified by:
        smudge in class Smudge
        Parameters:
        image - Frame
        Returns:
        resulting frame
